createwiki-defaultmainpage:
__NOTOC__
== Welcome to {{SITENAME}}! ==
This Main Page was created automatically and it seems it hasn't been replaced yet.

=== For the bureaucrat(s) of this wiki ===
Hello, and welcome to your new wiki! Thank you for choosing WikiTide for the hosting of your wiki, we hope you will enjoy our hosting.

You can immediately start working on your wiki or whenever you want.

Need help? No problem! We will help you with your wiki as needed. To start, try checking out these helpful links:
* [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Contents|MediaWiki guide]] (e.g. navigation, editing, deleting pages, blocking users)
* [[meta:Special:MyLanguage/FAQ|WikiTide FAQ]]
* [[meta:Special:MyLanguage/Request features|Request settings changes on your wiki]]. (Extensions, Skin and Logo/Favicon changes should be done through [[Special:ManageWiki]] on your wiki, see [[meta:Special:MyLanguage/ManageWiki|ManageWiki]] for more information.)

==== I still don't understand X! ====
Well, that's no problem. Even if something isn't explained in the documentation/FAQ, we are still happy to help you. You can find us here:
* [[meta:Special:MyLanguage/Help center|On our own WikiTide wiki]]
* On [[phorge:|Phorge]]
* On [https://wikitide.org/discord Discord]
* On IRC in #wikitide on irc.libera.chat ([irc://irc.libera.chat/%23wikitide direct link]; [https://web.libera.chat/?channel=#wikitide webchat])

=== For visitors of this wiki ===
Hello, the default Main Page of this wiki (this page) has not yet been replaced by the bureaucrat(s) of this wiki. The bureaucrat(s) might still be working on a Main Page, so please check again later!
createwiki-desc: An extension to easily create new wikis on a wiki farm.
createwiki-email-body: Hello! You recently requested a wiki on WikiTide. We are pleased to inform you that it has been approved! WikiTide is here to help you every step of the way, don't be afraid to ask! Visit our Help center for detailed help on a range of topics, such as managing your wiki using our ManageWiki tool, using images and templates, filing tasks, and more! Please remember that all wikis must abide by the Content Policy or they may be closed. Remember that your wiki cannot deviate too much from its approved purpose or it may be closed too. Thank you for choosing WikiTide! We wish you all the best on your new wiki adventure.
createwiki-error-dbexists: '''NOTE''': A wiki with this subdomain already exists.
createwiki-error-disallowed: The subdomain you have requested is unavailable. Please select another subdomain.
createwiki-error-notalnum: The subdomain selected contains non-alphanumeric characters. Please try again.
createwiki-error-notlowercase: The subdomain may not contain uppercase letters. Please try again.
createwiki-error-notsuffixed: The database name doesn't end in a valid suffix (e.g. 'wiki').
createwiki-error-subdomaintaken: The subdomain you requested is already taken. There might already be a wiki covering your topic; if that's the case, contribute to that wiki instead (wiki's on the same topic are prohibited and deleted upon detection). Select another subdomain and try again.
createwiki-help-reason: Please enter a sufficient summary describing the topic, scope, and purpose of the wiki you're requesting.
createwiki-label-reason: Describe the focus or purpose of this wiki:
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-creation: Notify me when my wiki has been created.
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-request-comment: Notify me when there is a comment on a wiki request.
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-request-declined: Notify me if my wiki request is declined.
notification-header-request-comment: A request you are following has received a new comment:
notification-header-request-declined: Your request has been declined for the following reason:
requestwiki-edit-success: Your changes to the wiki request have been successfully saved.
requestwiki-error-emailnotconfirmed: Your email is not confirmed. To request wikis, please [[Special:ChangeEmail|confirm an email]] first.
requestwiki-error-invalidcomment: Your wiki request contains an invalid character. Correct that and try again. If you need help, [[Help center|contact us]].
requestwiki-error-patient: You have already requested a wiki! Please be patient, your request is being reviewed. If you need to request another wiki, try again later.
requestwiki-header:
Thank you for choosing WikiTide to host your wiki! To get started, please fill out this form so we can review your request.
Your wiki request will be reviewed and it can be tracked at the page that will be given when submitting your request.
requestwiki-help-agreement: By submitting this wiki request, you agree to follow all policies.
requestwiki-help-bio: Make sure to follow this farm's policy on covering people.
requestwiki-help-migration-details: If you have any other details about your migration you think we should know about, let us know here. This field is only visible to wiki request reviewers.
requestwiki-help-migration-location: Enter the website URL from where the wiki is migrating.
requestwiki-help-public-description: Describe your wiki to the world. What does it focus on? Who is it geared to? This description is visible to the public via [[Special:WikiDiscover]].
requestwiki-help-private: Only administrators and those you allow will be able to view its contents.
requestwiki-help-sitename: This will be the wiki's name and will be the name of its 'Project' namespace.
requestwiki-help-siteurl: This will be the wiki's URL. If you wish to setup a custom domain, you still need to select a WikiTide subdomain first. [[Special:MyLanguage/Custom domains|Click here for more information]].
requestwiki-label-bio: This wiki's main subject(s) are living people or real-life groups
requestwiki-label-agreement: I agree to this farm's terms and conditions.
requestwiki-label-migration: This wiki is migrating wiki hosts
requestwiki-label-migration-location: Insert the URL of the original wiki:
requestwiki-label-migration-type: What type of migration is this?
requestwiki-label-migration-details: Insert any other details relevant to this request:
requestwiki-label-purpose: The purpose of this wiki is...
requestwiki-label-sitename: Select a name for your wiki:
requestwiki-label-siteurl: Select a subdomain for your wiki:
requestwiki-option-migration-fork: Forking (some users will remain on the old wiki)
requestwiki-option-migration-migrate: Full migration (most or all users are joining this new wiki)
requestwiki-option-migration-servermigra: Server migration (the wiki is self-hosted and is entirely moving over to WikiTide)
requestwiki-notloggedin: Please log in to request a wiki.
requestwiki-success: Your wiki request ($1) was successfully submitted. Your request will be reviewed as soon as possible.
requestwiki-unknown: No request exists with this ID.
requestwikiqueue-request-header-requeste: Comment given by the wiki requester
requestwikiqueue-request-info-submission: This pane allows you to handle wiki requests, change their visibility, and provide commentary while doing so. You can also edit request information. If you approve a wiki request, the wiki will be created automatically.
requestwikiqueue-request-label-action: What do you want to do?
